ABOUT_ME.MAIN_TEXT: Hi, I’m a German-speaking Frontend Developer based in Bispingen. Motivated by the limitless opportunities within IT, I am excited about crafting visually captivating and intuitive websites and applications.
ABOUT_ME.FLEXIBLE_WORK: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Bispingen and remotely.
ABOUT_ME.OPEN_MINDED: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
ABOUT_ME.PROBLEM_SOLVING: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your visions to life.

SKILLS.MAIN_TEXT: My journey has involved working on diverse projects, employing a range of frontend technologies and concepts. I am open to embracing new technologies and methodologies to Continously enhance my skills and stay ahead in the ever-evolving landscape of web development.
SKILLS.REACHOUT_TEXT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
SKILLS.SPECIAL_INTEREST: I have a special interest in learning

PROJECTS.EXPLORE_TEXT: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

FEEDBACK.HEADER_TITLE: What my colleagues say about me
FEEDBACK.TEXT1: You excel at solving complex programming problems quickly and integrating new technologies like the recent API implementation.
FEEDBACK.TEXT2: Your attention to detail ensures clean, maintainable code, and your clear communication simplifies teamwork.
FEEDBACK.TEXT3: I admire your structured approach to tasks and how patiently you explain complex topics to others.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact me
CONTACT.TEXT: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

CONTACT_FORM.EMAIL_ERROR_TITLE: Enter a valid email address (e.g. name@example.com)

POPUP.DESCRIPTION1: An interactive Pokedex inspired by the Pokémon universe. Search, explore, and view details about Pokémon using data from the PokéAPI. The app features smooth navigation, detailed Pokémon stats, and visuals, providing a seamless experience for Pokémon enthusiasts.
POPUP.DESCRIPTION2: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
POPUP.DESCRIPTION3: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
